alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 10 at 5:26AM EDT until August 11 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield County. * WHEN...This evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
